table.Name: דוח תמיכות ללא שיוך ספק
table.Title: דוח תמיכות ללא שיוך ספק
table.Query: with CTE (formatedDay) as ( select case when datename(dw,getdate())='sunday' then 'א' when datename(dw,getdate())='monday' then 'ב' when datename(dw,getdate())='tuesday' then 'ג' when datename(dw,getdate())='wednesday' then 'ד' when datename(dw,getdate())='thursday' then 'ה' when datename(dw,getdate())='friday' then 'ו' end ) select f.framename [FrameName] ,c2.name [SupporterJob], 'Supporter' = case when d.supportername like N'%''%' then REPLACE(d.supportername,'''','') when d.supportername is null then 'לתמיכה לא שייכו ספק' else REPLACE(REPLACE(d.supporterName , CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '') end , count(w.eventid) [NumOfSupports] FROM [Book10].[dbo].[TT_WP_Details] d left outer join (select id,wwid,formid,eventid,customerid,frm_catid,DetailsId,Comment,Status,PeriodKey,LoadTime,UserId ,dayid from book10.dbo.tt_wp_week) w on d.eventid=w.EventID and d.formid=w.FormID and isnull(d.detailsid,d.id)=w.DetailsId left outer join book10.dbo.tt_wp wp on wp.eventid=d.eventid and wp.formid=d.formid and isnull(wp.wpid,wp.id)=d.wpid left outer join B10Sec.dbo.tt_classes c on c.id =wp.rangeid left outer join B10Sec.dbo.tt_classes c1 on c1.id =wp.subjectid left outer join Book10_21.dbo.customerlist cl on cl.customerid=d.customerid left outer join Book10_21.dbo.framelist f on f.frameid= d.frm_catId left outer join B10Sec.dbo.tt_classes c2 on c2.id=d.helperId where f.framename is not null and frameid not in (122) and w.dayid=cast((select formatedDay from CTE) as nvarchar) and d.supporterName is null group by f.framename, d.supportername,c2.name order by supportername

table.Name: דוח ספקים
table.Title: דוח תמיכות לפי ספקים
table.Query: with CTE (formatedDay) as ( select case when datename(dw,getdate())='sunday' then 'א' when datename(dw,getdate())='monday' then 'ב' when datename(dw,getdate())='tuesday' then 'ג' when datename(dw,getdate())='wednesday' then 'ד' when datename(dw,getdate())='thursday' then 'ה' when datename(dw,getdate())='friday' then 'ו' end ) select f.framename [FrameName] ,c2.name [SupporterJob], 'Supporter' = case when d.supportername like N'%''%' then REPLACE(d.supportername,'''','') when d.supportername is null then 'לתמיכה לא שייכו ספק' else REPLACE(REPLACE(d.supporterName , CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '') end , count(w.eventid) [NumOfSupports] FROM [Book10].[dbo].[TT_WP_Details] d left outer join (select id,wwid,formid,eventid,customerid,frm_catid,DetailsId,Comment,Status,PeriodKey,LoadTime,UserId ,dayid from book10.dbo.tt_wp_week) w on d.eventid=w.EventID and d.formid=w.FormID and isnull(d.detailsid,d.id)=w.DetailsId left outer join book10.dbo.tt_wp wp on wp.eventid=d.eventid and wp.formid=d.formid and isnull(wp.wpid,wp.id)=d.wpid left outer join B10Sec.dbo.tt_classes c on c.id =wp.rangeid left outer join B10Sec.dbo.tt_classes c1 on c1.id =wp.subjectid left outer join Book10_21.dbo.customerlist cl on cl.customerid=d.customerid left outer join Book10_21.dbo.framelist f on f.frameid= d.frm_catId left outer join B10Sec.dbo.tt_classes c2 on c2.id=d.helperId where f.framename is not null and frameid not in (122) and w.dayid=cast((select formatedDay from CTE) as nvarchar) and d.supporterName is not null group by f.framename, d.supportername,c2.name order by supportername

table.Name: תוכניות תמיכה לתלמיד
table.Title: תוכניות תמיכה לתלמיד
table.Query: SELECT case when c1.Name IS NULL then N'לא הזינו כיתה' ELSE C1.NAME end AS Class, N'יש' [QF], p.CustomerId CustNum ,cl.CustLastNAme,cl.CustFirstNAme FROM (select * from Book10_21.dbo.TT_CustomerList cl where cl.CustomerId in (select CustomerID from Book10.dbo.TT_WP))p left outer join Book10_21.dbo.CustomerList cl on cl.CustomerId = p.customerid left outer join Book10_21.dbo.FrameList f on p.FrameID = f.FrameID left outer join Book10_21.dbo.ServiceList s on f.ServiceID= s.ServiceID LEFT OUTER JOIN Book10.DBO.TT_MP mp ON mp.CustomerId=p.CustomerID LEFT OUTER JOIN B10Sec.dbo.TT_Classes c on c.Id=mp.LayerId LEFT OUTER JOIN B10Sec.dbo.TT_Classes c1 on c1.Id=mp.ClassId where f.frameID =118 and f.ServiceTypeID=3 and f.frameid in (select FrameID from Book10.dbo.p0v_UserFrameList where UserID=864 ) --group by c1.Name,f.FrameId,f.framename,c.name union SELECT case when c1.Name IS NULL then N'לא הזינו כיתה' ELSE C1.NAME end AS Class , N'אין' [QF], p.CustomerId CustNum,cl.CustLastNAme,cl.CustFirstNAme FROM (select * from Book10_21.dbo.TT_CustomerList cl where cl.CustomerId not in (select CustomerID from Book10.dbo.TT_WP))p left outer join Book10_21.dbo.CustomerList cl on cl.CustomerId = p.customerid left outer join Book10_21.dbo.FrameList f on p.FrameID = f.FrameID left outer join Book10_21.dbo.ServiceList s on f.ServiceID= s.ServiceID LEFT OUTER JOIN Book10.DBO.TT_MP mp ON mp.CustomerId=p.CustomerID LEFT OUTER JOIN B10Sec.dbo.TT_Classes c on c.Id=mp.LayerId LEFT OUTER JOIN B10Sec.dbo.TT_Classes c1 on c1.Id=mp.ClassId where f.frameID =118 and f.ServiceTypeID=3 and f.frameid in (select FrameID from Book10.dbo.p0v_UserFrameList where UserID=864 )

table.Name: דוח תמיכות לספקים
table.Title: דוח תמיכות לספקים
table.Query: select REPLACE(f.framename,'''','') FrameName,isnull(cl.Name,'ללא תפקיד') Job, isnull(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(det.supportername,'''','') , CHAR(13),'-'), CHAR(10),'-'),'ללא שם ספק') Supporter, count(isnull(det.id,det.detailsid)) Count from (select * from book10.dbo.TT_WP_Details where loadtime > '01.09.2014') det left outer join (select * from book10_21.dbo.framelist ) f on f.frameid = det.frm_CatId left outer join b10sec.dbo.tt_classes cl on cl.id=det.helperid where f.frameid not in (122) group by f.framename, det.supportername,cl.Name order by f.framename,cl.Name, det.supportername
